Description: Rim sherd of North Ionian pottery bowl (rosette or lotus bowl); interior glazed with two added red bands lined in white; top of rim glazed; exterior, dull white slip: part of handle tendril and palmette, with trace of further decoration to right; black area below.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.270)
